channel.title: Exorcism 728 --- Great Economy Server With Friendly Staff And Community
channel.description:
Welcome to my thread about a new modern rsps called Exorcism!
We have helpful and active staff with a very friendly community with 24/7 Uptime.
[center]Features: All working skills (except construction) 100% Dungeoneering and Dungeoneering Rewards. Polypore Dungeon Jadinko Lair Barrows Minigames Gambling (trusted ranks only) Chaotics Godwars and Nex All working Nex Armours All working Spirit Shields Excellent Economy Many shops to add variety Donator zone Kalphite Queen KBD QBD Many training areas Many teleports Curses Lunars Ancients 100% working switches and much, much more. [/center]
We are already staffed so please do not beg although it may be earned in the future.
Please Feel Free To Ask Questions Below
Or contact on skype - Me: macauley.james.green The server owner: tom-pandemic
Thanks and have fun!
(Pictures will be up shortly)
Forums: http://exorcism.createaforum.com/index.php Client Download: http://uppit.com/ora2y1yeuejb/Exorcism_Client.rar
